input.sentences: our town 's annual marathon is quite an event .
people come from all over to compete and almost the whole town shows up to support them .
it does n't matter what your experience level is | everyone is welcome .
and the course is beautiful | winding down through the town 's historic district .
all in all it is a great time for not only the runners | but the people here in town .
output.sentences: I ran a 5k marathon in town today.
It was fun with people on the sidelines cheering us on.
I'm not much of a runner so I was near the back of the pack.
I loved running past all the historic buildings and old architecture.
And the best part was-- I actually finished the race.
